variable.name: clinic
variable.description: A1. Identifying information. De-identified EDIC clinic number

variable.name: form
variable.description: EDIC form number

variable.name: fsasdate
variable.description: A4. Identifying information. De-identified date form completed

variable.name: ieb1adat
variable.description: B1a. Recognition event. De-identified date of occurrence

variable.name: ieb1b
variable.description: B1b. Recognition event: if date uncertain

variable.name: ieb2dat
variable.description: B2. Recognition event. De-identified date clinic learned of the event

variable.name: ieb3
variable.description: B3. Recognition event. How did clinic learn of the event
variable.value: Annual medical history and physical exam
Clinic recognized event and informed patient

variable.name: iec1
variable.description: C1. Nature of event. What type of major accident?

variable.name: iec1oth
variable.description: C1. Nature of event. What type of major accident? Other, specify:

variable.name: iec2
variable.description: C2. Nature of event. Which of following did the patient require: patient hospitalization

variable.name: iec3a
variable.description: C3a. Nature of event. Where was the patient treated? Emergency room

variable.name: iec3b
variable.description: C3b. Nature of event. Where was the patient treated? Hospital inpatient ward

variable.name: iec3c
variable.description: C3c. Nature of event. Where was the patient treated? De-identified EDIC clinic

variable.name: iec3d
variable.description: C3d. Nature of event. Where was the patient treated? Other

variable.name: iec3doth
variable.description: C3d. Nature of event. Where was the patient treated? Specify

variable.name: iec4
variable.description: C4. Nature of event. Was any operation performed to treat the patient as a result of the accident?

variable.name: iec5adat
variable.description: C5a. Nature of event. De-identified date of admission

variable.name: iec5b1
variable.description: C5b1. Nature of event. Was any operation performed to treat the patient as a result of the accident? If treatment is still in progress

variable.name: iec5bdat
variable.description: C5b. Nature of event. De-identified date of discharge

variable.name: iec6a
variable.description: C6a. Nature of event. Occurred as a result of accident: death

variable.name: iec6b
variable.description: C6b. Nature of event. Occurred as a result of accident: injury to another person

variable.name: iec6c
variable.description: C6c. Nature of event. Occurred as a result of accident: property damage

variable.name: iec6d
variable.description: C6d. Nature of event. Occurred as a result of accident: traffic violation

variable.name: iec6e
variable.description: C6e. Nature of event. Occurred as a result of accident: other

variable.name: iec6eoth
variable.description: C6e. Nature of event. Occurred as a result of accident: specify

variable.name: iec7
variable.description: C7. Nature of event. What role did hypoglycemia play in this accident?

variable.name: ieresult
variable.description: C4. Nature of event. Was any operation performed to treat the patient as a result of the accident? Specify operation and result

variable.name: mask_pat
variable.description: A2. Identifying information. De-identified patient ID
